d0d5bbd3-fd1c-435a-a27d-2ad4eb40c812.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Catalyst Leadership Journey. Catalyst equips participants with knowledge of 10 proven Leadership Principles that apply to all roles and organizations. At the heart of each of these Principles is a simple tool participants have learned how to instantly start applying to the ‘moments of leadership’ they face every day – whether they happen at work, at home, or somewhere in-between.
d0d5bbd3-fd1c-435a-a27d-2ad4eb40c812.name: Catalyst

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Catalyst Leadership Journey.

skills.name: Earners Of This Badge Have Completed McKinsey Academy’s Catalyst Leadership Journey.

85dbc847-3ec2-48c5-8945-63816f2b9a16.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer Success Leader - Advanced” curriculum. This learning program enables participants to coach their teams to unlock advanced value for their customers and organization, effectively communicating value and insights during customer Quarterly Success Reviews, managing their account base with key metrics, and leading negotiations that optimize value for their customers and organization.
85dbc847-3ec2-48c5-8945-63816f2b9a16.name: Customer Success Leader - Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer Success Leader - Advanced” curriculum.

1a1084c3-2adb-4445-b728-3abf38be9f95.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer Success Leader - Mastery” curriculum. This learning program enables participants to coach their teams to anticipate and think strategically to solve complex customer problems, provide effective thought leadership, and develop and convert customer advocates. The program culminates in a capstone showcasing how they used Customer Success Academy learnings to drive value for a customer and convert them into an advocate.
1a1084c3-2adb-4445-b728-3abf38be9f95.name: Customer Success Leader - Mastery

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer Success Leader - Mastery” curriculum.

f256febd-4d51-470c-a338-89d0eef24f02.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Digital Leadership curriculum. This learning program enables participants to understand potential impact that can be achieved by Analytics and business agility, understand how to drive analytics at-scale and learn the three critical shifts required for business agility.
f256febd-4d51-470c-a338-89d0eef24f02.name: Digital Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Digital Leadership curriculum.

9c0a9ab9-4a9b-43ee-921e-d5e0fb6fd14b.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Digital Transformation Leadership Essentials (DTLE)” curriculum. This learning program enables participants to understand the six building blocks for launching, executing, and scaling digital transformations and the key mindset shifts required to adopt new ways of working.
9c0a9ab9-4a9b-43ee-921e-d5e0fb6fd14b.name: Digital Transformation Leadership Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Digital Transformation Leadership Essentials (DTLE)” curriculum.

4547b9a2-2d10-4241-b73d-5c9f9c47a8e8.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer-Centric Frontline Manager" curriculum as part of the Experience Academy program. This learning journey equips Frontline team leaders with the skills, tools, and mindsets to lead more customer-centric colleagues, and enables them to effectively upskill and coach those colleagues on empathic, customer-centric approaches to consistently surprise and delight their customers.
4547b9a2-2d10-4241-b73d-5c9f9c47a8e8.name: Experience Academy - Customer-Centric Frontline Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer-Centric Frontline Manager" curriculum as part of the Experience Academy program.

d8e82cfb-d8ec-4151-8a55-d207e20d18e1.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer-Centric Frontline Team Member” curriculum as part of the Experience Academy program. This learning journey equips Frontline teams with the empathic, customer-centric skills, tools, and mindsets to consistently surprise and delight their customers.
d8e82cfb-d8ec-4151-8a55-d207e20d18e1.name: Experience Academy - Customer-Centric Frontline Team Member

e70a7473-46ec-4d09-bf7b-1aff175da2c4.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s “Customer-Centric Leadership” curriculum as part of the Experience Academy program. This learning journey enables participants to understand the core elements of the Design Thinking problem-solving approach, to make more customer-centric decisions in their day-to-day work, and to lead a best-in-class CX organization by improving the capabilities of their people, and the processes and tools they use.
e70a7473-46ec-4d09-bf7b-1aff175da2c4.name: Experience Academy - Customer-Centric Leadership

96b74b33-0c01-4c70-93dd-698d0916567c.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Leadership Essentials program, part of Asian Leadership Academy. This program is designed to provide early careerists a foundational understanding of key functional areas (e.g., Operations, Marketing and Spend, Pricing) and to build a practical toolkit for aspiring managers and people leaders.
96b74b33-0c01-4c70-93dd-698d0916567c.name: Leadership Essentials, part of Asian Leadership Academy

fc98ec70-84b7-4014-bd52-60a8c4f1b767.description: Earners of this badge have completed McKinsey Academy’s Modern Marketing curriculum.
